title: Bitdonator
author: Bitdonator
content: I was looking for a small help.Need 0.001 BNB on BSC network for transaction fee, so I can swap my metamask token to BNB.Will repay 0.0015 BNB right after swap.Thank you

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: I tried, but Binance doesn't allow me to withdraw the 0.002 BNB I have. The best alternative I found is Fixedfloat: $1 worth of Litecoin (or a few other low-fee altcoins) gets you 0.0035 BNB.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: You would rather share your BNB address here. I would have sent you already. I have little funds in my hardware wallet.Quote from: LoyceV on October 01, 2022, 01:56:51 PMI tried, but Binance doesn't allow me to withdraw the 0.002 BNB I have.Binance minimum withdrawal for BNB is 0.01 BNB. Fixedfloat allows such small transactions too? I didn't know. Haven't used it in a while, maybe you know lol. Have to check how much commission I have earned lol.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on October 01, 2022, 02:30:47 PMFixedfloat allows such small transactions too? I didn't know. Haven't used it in a while, maybe you know lol. Have to check how much commission I have earned lol.It does, but it depends on the pair you want to exchange.For example, LTC to USDT minimum is 0.03428 LTC (~$1) while the ETH to USDT minimum is 0.005 ETH (~$6.8 )
